alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 2:01AM EDT until October 07 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.0 to 5.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 11 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. Other vulnerable shoreline roads may experience coastal flooding as well. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/08 AM 3.6/ 4.1 0.0/ 0.5 1.0/ 1.5 3-4 None 07/08 PM 4.9/ 5.4 1.3/ 1.8 1.7/ 2.2 4-5 Minor 08/08 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.1/ 0.6 1.2/ 1.7 6-7 None 08/08 PM 3.7/ 4.2 0.1/ 0.6 0.6/ 1.1 5 None 09/10 AM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.6/ 1.1 3 None 09/10 PM 3.9/ 4.4 0.2/ 0.8 0.8/ 1.3 3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
